title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Advancements in Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) and Strategies for Higher Education Application

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain content organization and operational procedures using a Learning Management System (LMS).
Learners can practice formative assessment design using smartphone-based evaluation tools.
Learners can analyze TEL (Technology-Enhanced Learning) application cases in constrained technological environments and propose institution-specific strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
